name: BDO-Japan
tagline: English Patch for Black Desert Japan
body:
### Welcome to BDO JAPAN.
BDO Japan is a project that involves the production of a English Patch, of the game **Black Desert Japan**.

Our goal is to keep constantly updated the patch as soon as possible after an client update, while a good translation quality will be priority and thus prevent it from being a lot of words that are not understood at all.


### BUY ME A BEER
**BDO-Japan** is a non-profit project and freely accessible to anyone, but like all **"WORKER"** would be great drink a **"BEER"** to recharge and keep working.

![Buy me a beer](http://thumbnails.billiondigital.com/398/207/1207398/1276349_small_checkboard.jpg) [**BUY ME A BEER**](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=CKHQXB9PT4TD6)

### Changelog & Support
To be aware of the changes made in the patch, simply visit our changelog:

[**CHANGELOG**](https://github.com/AsianGames/BDO-Japan/commits/master)


To report errors or lack of translation, visit the following link:

[**BUG TRACKER**](https://github.com/AsianGames/BDO-Japan/issues)


For suggestions or comments, send an email to:

**ag.bdojapan@gmail.com**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
